description: This model represents a commonly used packing list used in logistics and shipment of goods. It displays goods and their corresponding quantity, as well as, if given the Catena-X Id of the good.

urn_samm_io.catenax.packing_list_1.0.0_D.description: Describes the date in the following format: YYYY-MM-DD.

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.quantity_2.0..description: The quantity value associated with the unit expressed as float.
Characteristic for measurements of an item (mass, count, linear, area, volume, misc).

value.description: The quantity value associated with the unit.

unit.description: The unit of an item. Common units may be related to mass, count, linear, area, volume or misc.

urn_samm_io.catenax.packing_list_1.0.0_Q.description: Describes the quantity of the itemby providing a quantity value and the measurement unit in which the quantity is measured.

itemQuantityProperty.description: This property defines common units and the value for items. Items may be measured as mass, countable, miscellaneous, linear, area or volume.

urn_samm_io.catenax.packing_list_1.0.0_P.description: Describes the position in a numeric form.

urn_samm_org.eclipse.esmf.samm_character.description: Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.uuid_2.0.0_Uu.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the UUID is composed of five groups of characters separated by hyphens, in the form 8-4-4-4-12 for a total of 36 characters (32 hexadecimal characters and 4 hyphens), optionally prefixed by "urn:uuid:" to make it an IRI.

urn_samm_io.catenax.packing_list_1.0.0_L.description: Catena-X ID and data of the packing list item.

position.description: Numbering of all positions or items in the packing list.

itemDescription.description: Describes the item in the packing list.

itemName.description: Name of the item seen in the packing list.

catenaXId.description: The Catena-X ID of the given part (e.g. the assembly), valid for the Catena-X dataspace.

urn_samm_io.catenax.packing_list_1.0.0_S.description: Set Of List Items of the packing list.

urn_samm_io.catenax.shared.business_part.description: The provided regular expression ensures that the BPNA is composed of prefix 'BPNA', 10 digits and two alphanumeric letters.

listItems.description: Set of items part of the packing list.

senderAddress.description: Sender of the delivery, including the name and address.

receiverAddress.description: Receiver of the delivery, including the name and address.
